DOC.brief_title: A Research Study MK0633 Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) ( 0633-009 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Documented COPD define clinical history spirometry , symptom include dyspnea , wheeze , chest tightness , cough , sputum production , nocturnal awaken Male postmenopausal females 40 75 year age Impaired renal function History chronic liver disease persistent liver function test ( LFT ) abnormalities History recent cardiovascular clinical event Evidence another clinically significant , active pulmonary disorder bronchiectasis asthma
